doc:
Tom Pittman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Pittman 0 Tom Pittman (March 16, 1932 – October 31, 1958) was an American film and television actor. After his death at the age of 26, the Los Angeles Times called him "one of Hollywood's most promising young actors." Tom_Pittman ( March_16_,_1932 – October_31_,_1958 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . After his_death at the_age of 26 , the_Los_Angeles_Times called him " one of Hollywood 's_most_promising_young_actors .
